column4: Sometimes my android phone mount via USB and sometimes it doesn't.. Right now it won't.. How do I get it to mount and look at the sdcard?
I had that problem a lot with my phone too.. it seems to be the phone in my case.. usually have to reboot my phone when it fails to connect
somtimes going into settings and turning usb debugging on then off will reset the usb part of the phone without a full reboot
